subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Cardinals, who lost Carlos Beltran to a knee injury and waited out a nearly three-and-a-half-hour rain delay, beat the Giants and lead the National League Championship Series, 2-1.
snippet: The Cardinals, who lost Carlos Beltran to a knee injury and waited out a nearly three-and-a-half-hour rain delay, beat the Giants and lead the National League Championship Series, 2-1.
